title: Drawing, Design for Plain Serving Table with Lower Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Plain Serving Table with Lower Shelf
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, below image: cherry - mhy [for "mahogany"?] / [square with dot in center][inverted "V"][inverted "V"] / MU; across left edge and at upper center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Plain rectangular top raised on 4 straight tapering feet; conforming lower shelf attaches just above floor level.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Plain Serving Table with Lower Shelf, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-80
